content.question: At lunch with his colleagues, Carlo is discussing the stories told by the participants in his research on the effectiveness of cognitive behavioral therapy for participants diagnosed with a phobic disorder. Which of the following ethical principles is Carlo most likely violating?

choices.label: Approval by an Institutional Review Board

topic.text: 5.4: Selection of Categories of Psychological Disorders

skill.text: 2.D: Evaluate whether a psychological research scenario followed appropriate ethical procedures.
